statements: SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_results;
SELECT social_media_post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT id, social_media_post_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE social_media_post_id = 12345 OR social_media_post_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT social_media_post_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_category = 'Positive' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, analysis_date ASC;
SELECT id, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) OR sentiment_category = 'Negative' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT social_media_post_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC, sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sentiments;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_label FROM Sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE username = 'Alice' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_label, sentiment_score FROM Sentiments WHERE post_id = 12345;
SELECT post_id, post_content, username FROM Posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Sentiments WHERE sentiment_label = 'Positive' ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT post_content, post_date, username FROM Posts WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND post_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM Posts INNER JOIN Sentiments ON Posts.post_id = Sentiments.post_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT username, AVG(sentiment_score) as average_score FROM Posts INNER JOIN Sentiments ON Posts.post_id = Sentiments.post_id GROUP BY username HAVING AVG(sentiment_score) > 0.7 ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT sentiment_label, COUNT(*) as count FROM Sentiments GROUP BY sentiment_label ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, tweet_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results;
SELECT sentiment_label, timestamp, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, tweet_text FROM tweets WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT username, email, age, location FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM tweets JOIN users ON tweets.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT tweet_text, created_at FROM tweets WHERE user_id = 1 AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY username;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(tweet_id) AS total_tweets FROM tweets GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_tweets > 10 ORDER BY total_tweets DESC;

SELECT users.username, tweets.tweet_text, sentiment_results.sentiment_label FROM users JOIN tweets ON users.user_id = tweets.user_id JOIN sentiment_results ON tweets.tweet_id = sentiment_results.tweet_id WHERE users.location = 'California' AND sentiment_results.sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY users.username ASC, sentiment_results.sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentResults ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, post_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentResults WHERE positive_reviews > 10;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM UserSentiments WHERE sentiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT author_name, post_content FROM PostDetails WHERE post_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, positive_reviews, negative_reviews FROM UserReviews WHERE positive_reviews > 5 AND negative_reviews < 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentResults WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM PostDetails ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, post_content FROM PostDetails WHERE author_name = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM UserSentiments WHERE sentiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, positive_reviews, negative_reviews FROM UserReviews WHERE positive_reviews > negative_reviews;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT post_text FROM posts WHERE post_date > '2022-02-01';
SELECT hashtag_text FROM hashtags WHERE post_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results;
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, analysis_date FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_text, posts.post_date FROM users INNER JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id;
SELECT users.username, posts.post_text, posts.post_date FROM users INNER JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id WHERE posts.post_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY posts.post_date ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT users.username, posts.post_text, hashtags.hashtag_text FROM users INNER JOIN posts ON users.user_id = posts.user_id INNER JOIN hashtags ON posts.post_id = hashtags.post_id ORDER BY posts.post_date DESC;
